CustomReport.title: Find3_Abbreviation
CustomReport.description: Designed to help find specific record given the abbreviation of a taxon. Taxon abbreviation is entered, but all linked taxa will be found not just the one selected. Provides a list of the samples with grid refs and dates and records. Clicking on a line will go to the appropriate record

SQL.Where: Select Distinct S.Vague_date_start, TOCC.Taxon_Occurrence_Key,S.Sample_Key,S.Location_Name,LN.ITEM_NAME,S.SPATIAL_REF,dbo.LCReturnVagueDateShort(S.VAGUE_DATE_START, S.VAGUE_DATE_END,S.VAGUE_DATE_TYPE) as VagueDate,dbo.FormatEventRecorders(S.SAMPLE_KEY) as Recorder,ITN.Actual_Name From Sample S LEFT JOIN LOCATION L ON L.LOCATION_KEY = S.LOCATION_KEY LEFT JOIN LOCATION_NAME LN ON LN.LOCATION_KEY = L.LOCATION_KEY AND LN.PREFERRED = 1 INNER JOIN Taxon_Occurrence TOcc ON TOCC.sample_Key = S.Sample_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_Determination TDET ON TDET.Taxon_Occurrence_Key = TOCC.Taxon_Occurrence_Key and TDET.Preferred = 1 INNER JOIN Index_Taxon_Name ITN ON ITN.Taxon_List_Item_Key = TDET.Taxon_List_Item_Key INNER JOIN Index_Taxon_Name ITN2 ON ITN2.Recommended_Taxon_List_Item_Key = ITN.Recommended_Taxon_LIst_Item_Key WHERE
